text:
Filemón Bartolomé Vela Jr. (born February 13, 1963) is an American lawyer and politician. He has been the U.S. Representative for since 2013. He is a member of the Democratic Party.
He served as an intern in Congressman Solomon P Ortiz’s Washington, D.C. office. Vela earned his J.D. from University of Texas at Austin School of Law in 1987.

annotations.surface_form: University of Texas at Austin School of Law
